channel.title: GitHub Trending - Ruby (Weekly)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in Ruby nel periodo weekly

item.title: 📝 queenkiley/API-Documentation-Generator (26 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: queenkiley

📝 Repository: queenkiley/API-Documentation-Generator

📄 Descrizione: 📄 API Documentation Generator: A documentation builder that parses code comments atau schemas. ✍️ Creates clean, readable documentation automatically. ⚙️ 📝
